11-complex task 3:
```json
{
  "task1": "
def task1():
    # Open the note titled 'Project Updates'
    tap($open_note)
    notes_list = $open_note_title_list
    project_updates_note = notes_list.match('Project Updates')[0]
    tap(project_updates_note)
    
    # Search and highlight all instances of the word 'meeting'
    tap($search_within_note)
    set_text($search_text, 'meeting')
    # Highlight all instances (by continuously tapping 'Next' until no more matches)
    while len($next_matched_text) > 0:
        tap($next_matched_text)

    # Switch to the previous note
    tap($switch_to_prev_item)

    # Set the font size to 175%
    tap($settings)
    tap($set_font_size)
    tap($font_size_175%)

task1()
  ",
  "task2": "
def task2():
    # Create a new note titled 'Travel Itinerary'
    tap($create_note)
    set_text($add_note_title, 'Travel Itinerary')
    tap($add_note_ok)

    # Set the font size to 200%
    tap($settings)
    tap($set_font_size)
    tap($font_size_200%)

    # Toggle the app theme color to black & white
    tap($set_theme_color)
    tap($theme_color_black_white)

task2()
  ",
  "task3": "
def task3():
    # Open the note titled 'Annual Financial Plan'
    tap($open_note)
    notes_list = $open_note_title_list
    annual_financial_plan_note = notes_list.match('Annual Financial Plan')[0]
    tap(annual_financial_plan_note)
    
    # Search for the word 'budget' and highlight the next matching text
    tap($search_within_note)
    set_text($search_text, 'budget')
    tap($next_matched_text)

    # Sort checklist items by title
    tap($sort_checklist_items)
    tap($title_type)
    tap($sort_checklist_items_ok)

task3()
  "
}
```

task1()",

    # Open settings page
    tap($settings)

    # Configure font size for readability, selecting 150%
    tap($set_font_size)
    tap($font_size_150%)

    # Configure colors for presentation
    tap($set_colors)
    tap($set_background_color)
    # Assume we select a color and save it
    tap($save_set_colors)
    tap($set_text_color)
    # Assume we select a color and save it
    tap($save_set_colors)
    tap($set_primary_color)
    # Assume we select a color and save it
    tap($save_set_colors)
    tap($set_app_icon_color)
    # Assume we select a color and save it
    tap($save_set_colors)

    # Ensure data security by enabling automatic backups
    tap($set_enable_automatic_backups)

    # Close settings page
    back()

task2()",
  "task3": "def task3():
    # Open settings page
    tap($settings)

    # Optimize for readability by setting a higher font size (175%)
    tap($set_font_size)
    tap($font_size_175%)

    # Change to a readable theme color
    tap($set_theme_color)
    tap($theme_color_light)  # Assuming light theme is better for readability
    
    # Enable line wrap for better editing experience
    tap($set_enable_line_wrap)

    # Use monospaced font for coding or structured note-taking
    tap($set_use_monospaced_font)
    
    # Disable automatic backups to focus on editing without interruptions
    tap($set_enable_automatic_backups)

    # Optimize keyboard behavior
    tap($set_show_keyboard_on_startup)

    # Close settings page
    back()

task3()"
}
